list.description: I was born in Milan February 16, 1988.

list.title: From 2002 - 2007
list.subtitle: Hight School
list.description: I attended technical shool ITSOS Albert Steiner in Milan. It's a school of multimedia communication, the which main school subjects are: Photography, Cinema, Informatic, 3D Graphic and 2D Graphic. I've wanted to focus more on Information and Graphic subject school.
